h2: Your Biometric-enabled Wallet on GRVT Network
h3: The GRVT wallet, secured by Dfns, is built on the WebAuthn protocol that allows the use of passkeys for authentication. Passkeys are private keys that can be stored in various authenticators, ranging from secure enclaves in computers and phones to Yubikeys and other standard Universal 2nd Factor (U2F) hardware.

feat1.title: Streamlined biometric signatures
feat1.desc: Signing transactions with a passkey is easy: one-step signatures using Face ID or Touch ID; no passwords needed.

feat1.title: 100% Self Custodial
feat1.desc: Only you can sign your own transactions since GRVT stores only public keys.

feat1.title: Top-level security
feat1.desc: Passkeys follow FIDO Alliance and W3C standards, using cryptographic key pairs for top-tier security. They are never guessable, reused, or weak.

feat2.title: Your identity, your key
feat2.desc: Sign transactions effortlessly with Face ID or Touch ID.

feat2.title: Secure with multiple devices
feat2.desc: Secure your GRVT Wallet with passkeys from multiple devices, ensuring uninterrupted access to your funds.

feat2.title: Supports recovery
feat2.desc: Generate Recovery Codes to register passkeys on a new device if you lose access to the old ones associated with your GRVT wallet.

feat2.title: Web3 security on a Web2 experience
feat2.desc: Onboarding is a secure, straightforward one step process. Create your GRVT wallet. Access easily with passkeys from any device.

feat2.title: Tailored for all
feat2.desc: GRVT Wallet makes Web3 easy for all experience levels. It's designed for user convenience so you can focus on your trading.
